text: 21.24 Apo 18.18 God nop tap pak dagɨl sɨbog ñɨnɨgebal tek, nad am bɨ anɨb okok kɨlop de, God takaw ne pal ak kɨdek gɨl, wɨdɨn mɨdup ne adek sɨŋak teplep yenɨmɨb agɨlak. Nad tap God nop sɨbog ñɨnɨgabal okok tawɨl kɨlop ñe sɨbog ñɨnɨgel agɨlak. Sɨbog ñɨl, kɨmɨg wɨj kɨli ak tɨkɨnɨgabal agɨlak. Anɨge nɨm, binɨb mɨdupsek nep takaw agɨlak anɨb ak, yepɨs yɨbɨl agɨlak ak nɨgɨnɨgabal agɨlak. Nad Juda nɨb ak nɨm, chɨn Juda gɨpun tek gɨpan agɨnɨgabal agɨlak.
